p: In total, three RNA samples (NDV, NDH, and NV) were used for extraction, each with three biological replicates. “NDV” refers to vegetative cells of PCC 7120 cultured in BG110 (N-deficient medium), “NDH” refers to heterocysts of the PCC 7120 strain cultured in BG110, and “NV” refers to vegetative cells of the PCC 7120 strain cultured in BG11 (nitrogen-replete medium).
